title: INSTANT.IMMERSION.36.LANGUAGES.DELUXE.V3.0-EDGEISO
description:
_ _____  ______    _____     _ _____
        ._/ \___/._       _/  __/__._/ \___/
        |    __/__|  __       \        __/___.     Living on the EDGE
        |  _/     :    /    /   _/    /  _/      |
<-------|_________________/|________/|_________|----------------------------->

        RELEASE NAME ..... Instant Immersion 36 Languages Deluxe v3.0
        SUPPLIER ......... Team EDGE
        CRACKER .......... Team EDGE
        PROTECTION ....... RETAIL
        RELEASE DATE ..... 14/11/2008
        SIZE ............. 1 DVD + 1 CD
        URL .............. http://www.amazon.com/dp/B001HL4X1I

<------------------------------------------------------------------------------>

  PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

                  Instant Immersion 36 Languages Deluxe v3.0

   These are hybrid disks, works on both pc and mac!

   IMMERSE YOURSELF IN 36 NEW LANGUAGES, ALL ON 1 DVD-ROM.

   Choose a couple of languages to focus on or learn them all!

   Unlimited use of all language programs - perfect for brushing up on
   skills just before a trip.

   Features 36 of the world&#039;s most relevant languages with key
   words and phrases in each so you won&#039;t get overwhelmed.

   Languages:

    - Arabic                        - Korean
    - Bengali                       - Latin
    - Brazilian (Portuguese)        - Mandarin Chinese
    - Cantonese Chinese             - Norwegian
    - Dutch                         - Polish
    - English                       - Punjabi
    - Farsi (Persian)               - Romanian
    - Finnish                       - Russian
    - French                        - Slovak
    - German                        - Spanish
    - Greek                         - Swahili
    - Hawaiian                      - Swedish
    - Hebrew                        - Tagalog (Filipino)
    - Hindi                         - Thai
    - Hungarian                     - Ukrainian
    - Irish                         - Vietnamese
    - Italian                       - Yiddish
    - Japanese                      - Zulu

   Avoid sounding like a tourist by comparing your speech to a
   native&#039;s using the Speech Recording Feature.

   Words and phrases generated at random to help simulate real
   life conversations, 2 different skill levels to help you
   gradually transition from begineer to intermediate.

   Instant Immersion is #1 in language learning software, with
   content reaching over 20 million users worldwide.

   Developed by international linguistic and language experts, each
   program is strategically designed to meet specific language
   learner goals and different educational styles.

   Bonus multiTalk Vocabulary Builder: multiTalk is every traveler&#039;s
   best friend, giving you 50 key words in 36 different languages!

   This quick and handy reference tool will teach you essential words
   in any of the 36 languages and its revolutionary voice training
   feature will help you sound like a local!

   System Requirements:

   PC:
    - Windows XP & Vista
    - Pentium III 500MHz processor
    - QuickTime 6 or above
    - 1024 x 768 resolution, 16-bit color quality
    - 70 MB HD free space
    - 128 MB RAM
    - 24x DVD-ROM drive
    - 16-bit Windows-compatible soundcard
    - Microphone (recommended)

   MAC:
    - OS X (v.10.4 or higher)
    - QuickTime 7.1.5 or higher
    - 1024 x 768 resolution (millions of colors)
    - 70 MB HD free space
    - 128 MB RAM
    - 24x DVD-ROM drive
    - Soundcard
    - Microphone (recommended)

<------------------------------------------------------------------------------>

   INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS

   1. Unrar, Burn or mount with Daemon Tools.

   2. Install by running Start.exe.

   3. Enjoy.

<------------------------------------------------------------------------------>

       EVEN THOUGH QUALITY CANNOT BE DEFINED, YOU KNOW WHAT QUALITY IS.

<------------------------------------------------------------------------------>
